name: Animation-ish Advanced-ish Document
summary: Learn about .ISH3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: ISH3 files support background and foreground properties, clip art, and custom-drawn objects. They can be animated in the software at multiple speeds.
Advanced-ish documents are the most advanced of three document types supported by Animation-ish. "Wiggledoodle-ish" (.ISH1 files) and "FlipBook-ish" (.ISH2 files) are the other document types.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
